author: Supratik Hajare
text: 'The California burger came out really great. Great place to hangout with friends as they have got some seating area. Although they have small bar area
column5: its a cute bar . Outside seating makes it worth while as well. Their decor for Halloween was great too.'

author: Katie N
text: 'Ordered takeout and thought the food was just ok. Probably a better place to go and enjoy a few drinks'

author: Anne Brewer
text: 'We were visiting Hoboken from Philadelphia and were so happy we decided to stop in for drinks here! Nick the Bartender was fun and charismatic
column5: and makes a pretty darn good dirty martini! Plus
column6: as two girls originally from South Jersey
column7: it was nice to chat with someone who was also originally from there too!\n\nMy friend lost her contact and he even helped her make an eyepatch. We’re convinced he’s a doppelgänger for Ben Affleck. We hope to be able to visit again soon!'

author: Meredith Young
text: 'Had a great experience. Great food and service. Will be back!'

author: Ralf274
text: 'Always great food and awesome atmosphere!'

author: David Pizzolato
text: 'Neat place for a meal and some drinks'

author: Thomas Engstrom
text: "Best Guinness pour I know of. I'm a long time patron and love the place. Good food. Good people. Good service and prices. Five stars!"

author: Justin Norris
text: 'Timeless go-to spot
column5: for just about anyone who enjoys hidden gems.'

author: Gregory Gioia
text: 'Great wings. Service was excellent'

author: Bruce Van Kirk
text: 'The food is constantly well prepared and flavorful
column5: staff members gives excellent service. I loved the cleanliness and mood. Keep up the good work.'

author: Sinan Sahin
text: 'Good Pasta.'

author: Chris LaRose
text: 'Amazing food and the servers were even better.'

author: richard newmark
text: 'Best bar Hoboken..'

author: Tiffany Mo
text: '10/10. Great service. Our server Amanda in the chic one shoulder dress was amazing. So attentive and just a freakin’ GODDESS slinging’ High Noons like her life depended on it.'

author: Angel C
text: 'Was craving Fish and Chips and looked up this place. The fish was fresh and the fries were crispy and good! The ambiance was super chill and did I mention the service was good
column5: attentive waiter.'

author: Miguel Alvarez
text: 'I really love this place
column5: amazing service.'

author: Vivian Torres
text: 'Excellent food and even better service!!!! The burger was so juicy!!!'

author: Tarin Shulze
text: 'Really delicious drinks and food. A pretty classic\nIrish bar.'

author: Alex Rivas
text: "Can't emphasize enough how amazing this place is.  Everything from the food to the service is top-notch.  One of my favorite places to visit."

author: Pedro Sanchez
text: 'Decent bar food'

author: Angela LaFace
text: 'We went in there late on a Tuesday after my son baseball game & the service & food were fabulous! Juicy Brie burger & a juicy chicken sandwich! The side item portion is tremendous!!!'

author: VisualLearning Solutions
text: "Best Buffalo Wings I've ever had. Great Service and people."

author: Andrew Freeman
text: 'Great pub
column5: and the outdoor seating is really nice. The good here is delicious. We had the steak sandwich
column6: brie burger
column7: and chicken sandwich. All great choices!'

author: Priya Gautam
text: 'Limited menu but I love the coconut shrimps'

author: Laura Hughes
text: '"Excellent service from the Bartender and great prices for both drinks and food."'

author: Jason Zeke
text: 'Always great here'

author: 노라Nora
text: 'Their pasta is pretty phenomenal and the atmosphere is cozy and welcoming. The drink selection is less than ideal on the nonalcoholic side but I keep coming back for their rigatoni and penne alfredo anyway because its worth the sacrifice of drinking only water or cranberry juice when I go.'

author: Joanne Nick
text: 'The best wings in Hoboken by far! Great service and consistent quality each time.'

author: William L
text: 'Consistently good drinks and food! The staff is friendly and attentive.'

author: Frank Deste
text: 'Nice cubby hole'

author: James Aaron Adams
text: "Great beer selection
column5: cozy spot. It's a great place to meet up with the friends."

author: Kelsey Sanczyk
text: 'Horrible experience. Worst service I’ve had it years! I came in with a group of 5....Drinks took FOREVER! Took 20 minutes to get a bottle of bud light. Once the food came out one of the burgers was raw (after ordering it medium) so we sent it back to be cooked more. They took 30 minutes to recook the burger and at that point the other people in the group had already finished their meal. Only thing that was done in a timely manned was the waitress bringing the check (with raw burger on the bill). Will not be back again.'

author: Theresa Selamie
text: 'Great wings & eggrolls'

author: Daniel Gillet
text: 'Best Buffalo chicken sandwich/wrap/wings/anything Buffalo in Hoboken.'

author: Margarita Alvarado
text: 'Service was very pleasant. Place is very quaint and cozy. Ordered the Buffalo Wings and Morning After Burger for brunch and everything was absolutely amazing. I will definitely be visiting again and recommending this place to others.'

author: Vicki Rimasse
text: 'Amazing food.'

author: Leanne Tonsing
text: 'Great service and decent meal for a quick bite. Drinks are on par though.'

author: Isabella Kapczynski
text: 'Wonderful bar with great drinks
column5: great music
column6: great atmosphere
column7: great bartenders and lots of space
column8: had a fantastic evening and will definitely be back!'

author: Alex Keichinger
text: 'Great little gem in Hoboken. Awesome wings'

author: Bob Murphy
text:
'Great little bar restaurant.
Absolutely loved the atmosphere.  Nice cozy room with a fireplace.  Had an "old" feel to it even though everything was newer and up to date.
Due to Covid spacing restrictions we had to sit upstairs in that bar area...that certainly didn't take away from the experience.
The food was very good.  Good bar selection.
Can honestly say that if my coworker and I (we were on a business trip) lived in the area
column5: that would be our hang out.'

author: slug
text: 'really good food
column5: comfy atmosphere
column6: and orders were made in really good timing
column7: would recommend!! and definitely would revisit!!'

author: Anthony Nahas
text: 'Great service
column5: cool place and the food was pretty good.\n\nI wish i got the chicken wings
column6: heard from some friends they are really good. Maybe ill order them online.'

author: Krystle Henley
text: "Management needs to review the steps of service with staff and work on professional attitudes. You can't treat customers the way we were treated last night. It's unprofessional. One of the servers seemed like she wasn't in a good mood and was annoyed with us from the second we got there. She cleared the table and at one point shook off my friends fork from the plate. Then we got our food more than an hour later (struggled to finish our meals at that point) and then 20 minutes after we got our food someone was trying to clear our table."

author: Scott Feighner
text: 'Recommended by family friend.  Met all expectations.  Great food and service !'

author: Emily Sayles
text: 'Definitely a place for the regulars. No tourists
column5: most patrons know each other
column6: mid 30s-late 40s professionals'

author: María José García
text: 'I took my boyfriend for dinner on 09/30. It was alright. We had  a table across the street. Good service in general. I remember I had the Pear Goat cheese Salad
column5: good flavor I will just recommend to add more than 4 small balls of goat cheese and pay attention to the cherry tomatoes since 3 half had mold on it. Every place deserves a second chance so we will go back again and see what happens. With the time it will be nice if you can spice up the tables across the street to make it a nicer place to eat :)'

author: Brad Harken
text: 'Great food. Cold Guinness. Good time.'

author: M A
text: 'Great food'

author: James Bond
text: 'Delicious food.'

author: Bedwas
text: 'Consistently the best place in town.'

author: Sophie Goldberg
text: 'Great prices and selection'

author: Don Brovero
text: 'First time I have ever been here.  Food was excellent. We had the chicken wings and I had the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich. They have a lot of outside seating. The price is very reasonable. The service was slow at first but I think they were understaffed. Once they got going
column5: they were very attentive. I will be back.'

author: Mr. Neil
text: 'Best wings (Buffalo & Sweet Chili) in New Jersey
column5: hands down. They recently repeated their win for best wings in Hoboken too. Outside of the wings
column6: the food is excellent overall.'

author: Eric Hammer
text: 'Five stars for this casual
column5: cozy Irish pub. BEST WINGS IN HOBOKEN.\n\nI\'m very particular with my buffalo sauce. I find that a lot of buffalo sauces are "sweet"
column6: which is typically not what I prefer. I tend to lean towards the more savory/spicy sauce. Carpe Diem has a sweeter sauce
column7: and I STILL think they\'re the best wings in Hoboken.\n\nAs good as the wings are
column8: it\'s quite the opposite with the fries. The buffalo wings are remarkable
column9: and the fries are remarkably underwhelming. No biggie
column10: plenty of other things on the menu. Plus it\'s all about the wings.'

author: Ryan Kulp
text: 'Just came here during covid. They have plenty of seating outside
column5: which is fantastic. But even better than the seats and space during the pandemic is the unbelievable staff who waited on us. The staff is amazing. Incredibly attentive and polite. The food is also really good. Karena was our waitress and is absolutely amazing! Will be back'

author: Michael Salty
text: "I love Carpe Diem! They're the friendliest staff in Hoboken
column5: and the food is absolutely amazing. I'd recommend the wings
column6: the mushroom soup

author: Kara
text: 'Perfect quarantine food! We order delivery often
column5: and it never disappoints.'

author: Dana Hansen
text: 'Ordered online during COVID19 and was so pleased with the experience! The delivery was right on time and the food was delicious! So fresh and exactly as ordered. Will definitely order again!'

author: Michelle Rivas
text: 'My favorite place in Hoboken! Super cozy spot with great comfort food + the fireplace. It’s great when you walk into a bar and the bartender knows your drink order and you don’t even need to be a frequent visitor. They care about every person that walks in and wants to make that connection. A mini community at a bar is the best feeling. 🙂\n\nP.S. I recommend getting a buffalo chicken wrap or their award winning wings - try the sweet chili flavor!'

author: Anna B
text: 'I LOVE THE FOOD !!!!!'

author: Ryan Lynch
text: 'Sweet Bar
column5: was here for a private party upstairs.  Very solid'

author: Jeffrey Sierra
text: 'This is my go-to bar when I want some wings
column5: beer and a TV to watch games. Real friendly bar with a 2nd floor and intimate tables by the fire as well as a bar to sit and enjoy some quick eats. Definetely recommend.'

author: Nicholas Currie
text: 'Wing are amazing'

author: Michael Desousa
text: 'Really an all around great cozy little spot. If you’re in the area or just leaving the movie theater you should really come here. The steak sandwich was big and fat
column5: pretty much an entire steak. The service was great and the place doesn’t smell and is really clean. The wings were recommended to me and I would say they some of the best I’ve ever had. This will be one of my new favorite place to hang out or eat in Hoboken.'

author: Ali Naderi
text: "Their gravy is to die for. Best fries I've had in a while. Pasties > shepherd's pie. The open faced sandwich and burger we're good."

author: Vincent McGlory
text: 'Had a great time! Definitely made this out of towner feel welcome!'

author: Bobby Marks
text: 'Best wings in hoboken. Great staff. Not a ton of seating so call ahead for wait times. Beer selection is killer.'

author: Chris Rudloff
text: 'Got dragged here for the wings and boy they did not disappoint. Vast beer selection and some great happy hour drink and food specials. Right next to the bow tie theaters too!'

author: Thomas Ancilleri
text: 'Pretty good bar to grab a good bite to eat and a beer. Has a nice low light vibe in here and a fireplace in the back. All the food here is pretty good especially the steak sandwich.'

author: Agan Singh
text: 'This is a great neighborhood bar to hang out and the food is awesome too. I had the open face Turkey sandwich with house chips. They also have a different dessert every night. I had the lava cake with a scoop of ice cream and it was awesome.'

author: Ray McCarthy
text: 'Great food
column5: warm atmosphere and wonderful staff'

author: Desmond Miller
text: 'Nice place....good food!\nGreat Hospitality!'

author: Tara Chiaravalloti
text: 'Great intimate place to grab a bite before or after a movie! Also love how their menu shows you what drinks to pair with your dish. The staff is friendly and accommodating.'

author: Thomas Davidson
text: 'We enjoy eating out. Last night we came to this fine place which friends told us about. We had a delightful time there with great food and a well-trained stuff and an impressive chief cook. We  added this place in our phone list  and we shall no doubt visit again soon. We highly recommend.'

author: Susan Kobylarz
text: 'Best wings!'

author: Carla Sandoval
text: '(Translated by Google) Very cool
column5:
I liked it !!!

(Original)
Muy chévere
column6: me gustó !!!'

author: Charles Mercado
text: 'From the moment  you enter this place  team give you a good feeling. Very courteous hosts
column5: it is a good place to  enjoy with your friends or with your date. yummy  food
column6: professional  chief cook and stuff
column7: comfortable  pay and courteous  service. Highly recommended.'

author: Ana Patrícia Olenscki Kawamorita
text: 'I really love this place. Super cozy
column5: always a great crowd
column6: and the service is great! Last night we had the California burger and the Southwest chicken rolls and both were delicious! It was busy without being overwhelming and I really appreciate that. The second
column8: with a little fireplace to add to the ambiance and two TVs so we didn\'t feel left out of the sports atmosphere. Always a great time!'

author: David Donovan
text: 'Great wings'

author: Anime Angie
text: 'Amazing service
column5: cozy interior
column6: and the food was wonderful and very flavorful. I was especially happy to find that they did not put any MSG in their food!'

author: Dmitri Ogorodnikov
text: 'Cozy  place
column5: great food
column6: decent price'

author: Kristina Bodnya
text: 'I moved to Hoboken relatively recently and I was a bit surprised entering this Irish pub and seeing the majority of visitors had pasta in their plates. There were plenty of pasta options
column5: risotto and fresh mozzarella on the menu
column6: no beef stew though. Everything else was perfect.'

author: Midian Gladstone
text: 'This place is one of my favorites! Fair rates
column5: large portions and the staff members are constantly very friendly.'

author: Greg Piesco
text: 'Great local place good food good prices'

author: Julian Hagmann
text: 'Best wings in Hoboken
column5: hands down.'

author: Jeska Padilla
text: "I just hated it honestly. It's needs more flavor! Service was fine I guess but still. Their wings are  H O R R I B LE . I would not reccomend . they cant even get simple things to taste right"

author: KHOA MAT BV115
text: 'Excellent food
column5: super friendly staff
column6: constantly fantastic ambience. They charge reasonable prices and the food quality is fantastic. 5 stars.'

author: RIPC. TV (ripc1018)
text: 'Took a really long time for the waitress to get to us
column5: but she was a good waitress.  Food was good and I really love how the menu suggests what type of wine or beer to have with each meal.'

author: Kev Rio
text: 'A cozy classic pub in northern Hoboken with delicious fare'

author: Chris Frie
text: 'Great neighborhood pub. Every other pub in that area was dead on Sunday Labour Day weekend night. But when we popped our heads in there
column5: Carpe Diem was full of life'

author: Brett Hladczuk
text: 'I eat wings everywhere I go that has wings
column5: and this place might have the best wings in Hoboken. The other food I had was hit or miss with more hits than misses. The vibe was good (nice bartender
column6: nice people) besides the fact that we were the only ones under 30 in the place. I’m between a 4 and a 5 but I love wings so that gives this place the push I needed.'

author: Amer ALKAHWAJI
text: 'A nice and cozy local place in Hoboken
column5: have been there twice
column6: the food was good and the service was quick. Sitting outdoor is available during summer. Waiters are friendly.'

author: Sam Dokus
text: 'The wings were great! Not great napkins tho.'

author: Samay Kapoor
text: "Good beer and liquor selection and amazing bartenders. Best wings I've had and the rest of the food is legit."

author: Rory Mckay
text: 'I simply liked their dishes. I always get great service here. The place is clean and the staff members are always very friendly. Will come visit again.'

author: Mawel Soler
text: 'Very very good wings definitely recommend it. The chicken frances was tasty. Our waitress Morgaine was very knowledgeable and friendly.'

author: HECTOR CORPORAN
text: 'Good service and food.  Not too pricy.'

author: TeeP Goard
text: 'I ordered a steak cooked medium and I got it cooked well done
column5: though and had a bitter taste. Wasted my money'

author: Kathleen “Kat” Whelan
text: 'Loves it'

author: bill wire
text: 'Great allround spot'

author: Frances Trompeta
text: 'Typical hole in the wall dive bar. Bartenders are kind.'

author: Lewis Pyburn Jr
text: 'Cute
column5: small
column6: not to loud (in the back room). Would be nice for a date night. Staff are quick and friendly. The beer selection is limited. The pasties were nice. The wine sauce (gravy) helped make them better. Wife and I will be coming back again for a round two.'

author: Brandon Germain
text: 'Food was decent
column5: the service was terrible. After having to reorder the " Signature Cocktails
column6: Twice " my girl friend and I were then inappropriately addressed by the bartender himself
column7: older short bald man with a disgusting attitude who confronted me at our table during dinner and literally refused to provide another drink because he thought I was complaining about the quality...I simply requested two new drinks for my girl friend and I and he acted like a child throwing a temper tantrum and embarrassing himself in front of many other customers
column8: some who left due to his lack of professionalism and ridiculous behavior. I will never revisit this restaurant again
column9: due to his poor work ethic...'

author: James Foley
text: 'Excellent wings'

author: Christina G
text: "Food and drink was decent and our waiter was excellent. But after waiting 20 minutes
column5: the waiter brought out our entrees and had to apologize and explain that the kitchen had decided to skip our appetizer. It would have helped if the kitchen had set rules like this before we ordered (not that it makes sense either way
column6: given that there were a handful of other tables sitting and eating or waiting for food) but definitely a first time for me hearing that a kitchen staff just didn't feel like making part of an order."

author: John Pope
text: 'Always a good burger.'

author: Linda Alejandra Rozo Hurtado
text: 'Great food and customer service!'

author: madhusha urlam
text: 'The place is a wonder to my surprise. Besides Hotel Daspalla in the very busy roads of Jbhills. There is an open area with live music and decent ambience outside this DJ floor and bar. …'

author: Zak Bax
text: 'Best buffalo wings. Good food in general.'

author: Seth Wright
text: 'Great happy hour specials!  Decent food.'
